item.title: Bitcoin Profitable Days
item.description: Created a chart that displays all the days when it would have been profitable to buy BTC, compared to today’s price. Profitable days are in green, and non-profitable in red. Date May 2020 Technology React Javascript Recharts Bitcoin API Github https://github.com/gautiermarechal/btc-profitable-days-chart
